about-me.title: About Me
about-me.p1: I am a young man of 20 years old passionate about the design and development of web applications that stands out for its proactivity and its willingness to improve every day. I have preferences towards the Front-End, however I have knowledge of the Back-End.
about-me.p2: My goal is to focus on the Front-End and develop my professional career in the IT world as part of a company that allows me to grow professionally and take advantage of everything I have learned so far.

my-projects.title: My Projects
my-projects.weather-app-description: Application that when receiving a location, returns the weather in real time. Technologies: ReactJS/SCSS. (RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)
my-projects.felix-description: Web application of movies and series developed mainly with ReactJS, Firebase and SCSS. (RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)
my-projects.fitness-shop-description: E-commerce of fitness products developed mainly with ReactJS, Firebase, MUI and SCSS. (NO RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)
my-projects.panthera-clothes-description: E-commerce of clothing for both genders developed with HTML, JavaScript and SCSS. (NO RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)
my-projects.carajo-description: Web model of a music band. Technologies: HTML, SCSS, Bootstrap. (RESPONSIVE WEB DESIGN)

studies.title: Studies
studies.backend-description: Backend course in CoderHouse where Express, Templates, SQL, Mongo DB, among others, were used.
studies.react-description: React JS course covering the following topics: Promises, APIs, Contexts, States, Routing, Firebase, and more.
studies.js-description: JavaScript course. We worked mainly with: Node, Dom, Events, AJAX & Fetch, Storage, and Workshop.
studies.web-development-description: Web Development course at CoderHouse where I learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, SEO, Git and GitHub.

footer.credits: Developed and designed by Alejo Feas Matej
